page.title: 10S.NORMANTON-MINERS' STRIKE
page.content: The miners' strike began in February 1984 and lasted approximately one year.It ended with a slow drift back of miners to work.The miners' strike had a tremendous effect on the South Normanton and Pinxton area.It brought forward terrible scenes of violence and injury and it broke up friendships,families and communities.It started when Corton Wood pit in Yorkshire was ordered to close by the National Coal Board. There were many scenes of violence in our area because it lies on the border of South Nottinghamshire and Derbyshire.The miners in the South Nottinghamshire area were still working,while those in Derbyshire were on strike.People on strike were calling people who were working names. However now the strike has ended the wounds are beginning to heal slowly...
